sentences.en: A bad headlines is which infrequently a answer is no.
sentences.cn: 坏消息是上帝的答案有时是否定的.

sentences.en: Differential diagnosis of the disease is not infrequently difficult.
sentences.cn: 这种病的鉴别诊断往往很难.

sentences.en: Eat cured or smoked meats infrequently.
sentences.cn: 不要常吃腌制或熏烤的肉.

sentences.en: For infrequently used items pack them long before moving.
sentences.cn: 不用的东西,早在搬家前就可先打包.

sentences.en: He often leaves me alone at home at least not infrequently.
sentences.cn: 他常常留我独自在家,这情况不是不常见.

sentences.en: I saw him not infrequently during the difficult years he spent in Paris.
sentences.cn: 在他落魄巴黎的一段坎坷困顿的日子里,我经常和他见面.

sentences.en: Jeremy does play cricket, but very infrequently.
sentences.cn: 杰里米确实玩板球，但次数很少。

sentences.en: Not infrequently does the Company take on good - record graduates.
sentences.cn: 该公司随时准备收揽成绩优异的学生.

sentences.en: Not infrequently he was termed Hurry Skurry.
sentences.cn: 有时他被称为哈利·霹雳.

sentences.en: Politics is hardly a science and it too infrequently depends on reason.
sentences.cn: 政治并不算是科学,它经常性地要依靠理智.

sentences.en: Scientists suspect that this slow rate explains why eruptions occur infrequently in the area.
sentences.cn: 科学家们认为,这样慢的速度可以解释为什么在这一地区火山喷发并不频繁.
大的成功并不经常到来.

sentences.en: The potential complications of varicocele repair occur infrequently and are usually mild.
sentences.cn: 精索静脉曲张手术并发症不常见,通常很轻微.

sentences.en: Waterspouts and hailstorms occur infrequently , while snow and tornadoes are rare.
sentences.cn: 水龙卷和冰雹偶有出现, 降雪和陆龙卷则属罕见.

sentences.en: When we are isolated and poor, we are not infrequently forgotten.
sentences.cn: 当我们一贫如洗, 离群索居的时候,往往是没人想到我们的.

words.tran_cn: 罕见的；稀少的；珍贵的；不频发的
